species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan

participants chose between two locations (A/B) with cups containing different (12= experimental version) or the same (11= control version) amounts  of food - Object condition - food presented as a solid in two locations (obj_11/obj_12)/ Slices to solid- food presented in three pieces and rearranged into a perceptually whole piece hidden in one location (slis_11/slis_12)/ Solid to slices condition- food in pieces presented as whole then decomposed into three single slices and rearranged into whole pieces again hidden in one location (sols_11/sols_12)
whether the response was correct or incorrect
